title: Fitness Center, Beautiful 1- and 2-Bedroom Newly Renovated Apartments
map_address: 474 S Wright St near West Virgina Ave
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to Mountain Vista Apartments', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 3', 'OR Text', '3', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our leasing team.', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 500 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Vinyl Hardwood Floors and Carpeting', '- Beautiful 1- and 2-Bedroom Newly Renovated Apartments', '- Updated Kitchens with Espresso or White Cabinetry and a Full Suite of Appliances', 'Community Amenities', '- Fitness Center', '- On-Site Management with Courtesy Package Acceptance and 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '- Sparkling Heated Swimming Pool (Summer)', '- Pet-Friendly Community with Bark Park', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.', 'Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'Income Requirements:', 'Income that grosses at 2.5 times monthly rent', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:11:00AM-5:00PM', 'Saturday:11:00AM-4:00PM', 'Mountain Vista Apartments', '474 S Wright St, Lakewood, CO, 80228', '87LNrf2pdaO0']
